page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
{HOLM PLACE FARM} Holm Place Farm is owned by Mr and Mrs Lewis.It is 400 acres in area. There are more than{1000 sheep and {lambs,33 beef cattle,2 bulls,33 {calves,7 heifers in calf,6 maiden {heifers and a few ducks,hens and {geese.}There are 2 containers of molasses,urea and magnesium and 2 grain bins for feeding the animals.Mr Lewis has 3 tractors and a fork lift truck with a hay lifter and dung grabber.There is also a shed which stores 1.5 tons of fleeces including 3 black fleeces.There is a salt mine on the farm. Holm Place Farm is a very old farm and one of the oldest on the Isle of Sheppey.
Rebecca Cook.
